message: Does any software or a website exist that would allow me to "draw" on graph paper electronically then save, email, and print?  I did a quick search and got buried in sites that only generate blank graph paper to be printed.
I wonder if you could upload a graph paper image (with transparent background) to this? http://www.cosketch.com
I was looking for collaborative mind mapping web sites, and it was on this list http://www.freetech4teachers.com/2010/03/nine-tools-for-collaboratively-creating.html
